sentences.en: " This Krakatoa is at once exhausting and riveting . "
sentences.cn: 犹如 喀 拉喀托火山在瞬间爆发了出来.

sentences.en: Designed for riveting golf bag bottom.
sentences.cn: 适用于适用于高尔夫球袋底部的铆合.

sentences.en: Drama is riveting to the Human Being, and solution is not.
sentences.cn: 对人类来说戏剧是让人兴奋的, 解答(却)不是.
他的故事让人听得欲罢不能。

sentences.en: Hydraulic system supplied large punching and riveting force.
sentences.cn: 采用柱塞式液压系统,冲铆力大,角连接强度高.

sentences.en: Hydraulic system supplied large punching and riveting fore.
sentences.cn: 采用液压系统,冲柳力大,角连接强度高.

sentences.en: I find snooker riveting though I don't play myself.
sentences.cn: 虽然我自己不打斯诺克，但是我觉得它挺令人着迷。

sentences.en: It reached a riveting 364 basis points on October 10 th.
sentences.cn: 10月10日,它更是达到了戏剧般的364个基点.

sentences.en: Later, denim was substituted, and copper riveting was added to pocket seams.
sentences.cn: 后来又用粗斜纹布取代帆布, 并用裤袋边上加了铜钉.

sentences.en: Strong technical force, a senior riveting workers, senior welder, senior fitter people.
sentences.cn: 技术力量雄厚, 有高级铆工 、 高级焊工 、 高级钳工多人.

sentences.en: The last chapter was so riveting that I was reading past midnight.
sentences.cn: 最后一章是如此引人入胜,以至于午夜过后我还在津津有味地读着.

sentences.en: The riveting force is generated hydraulically or pneumatically, depending on the model.
sentences.cn: 根据型号的不同,铆接力输出分为液压和气压两种.

sentences.en: The utility model relates to an ultrasonic riveting device.
sentences.cn: 本实用新型涉及一种超声波铆镦装置.

sentences.en: The working table is adjustable while the riveting unit remains fixed.
sentences.cn: 工作台面高度可调节,而铆接单元保持固定.

sentences.en: They then gave a riveting press conference at 11 o '.
sentences.cn: 十一点整召开受人关注的新闻发布会.

words.tran_cn: 铆接；固定；（把目光、注意力等）集中于

trans.tran_cn: 饶有趣味的，非常精彩的，引人入胜的
trans.tran_en: something that is riveting is so interesting or exciting that you cannot stop watching it or listening to it

trans.tran_cn: 铆接( rivet的现在分词 )，把…固定住，吸引，引起某人的注意
